chapters.title: Chapter 17: Partings, and a Meeting
chapters.info: Chesmal Emry, p. 254—Aes Sedai of the Black Ajah, formerly of the Yellow. She is tall and handsome with dark hair and eyes. She was one of the most Talented Healers in years; she now uses her Talent for torture and murder. She once put Tamra Ospenya to the Question, and convinced the Red Ajah to murder Sierin Vayu before she could order Chesmal's own arrest. Chesmal killed Vandene and Sareitha after Vandene stabbed Careane.
